title: 301. Q&AF: Creating Brand Loyalty, Leadership As An Unsociable Person & Talking Politics At Work
itunes:title: 301. Q&AF: Creating Brand Loyalty, Leadership As An Unsociable Person & Talking Politics At Work
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on the best way to make people loyal to your brand, how a naturally reserved individual can develop better leadership skills, and if it's a smart idea to allow political talk to be discussed at work.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on the best way to make people loyal to your brand, how a naturally reserved individual can develop better leadership skills, and if it's a smart idea to allow political talk to be discussed at work.
